items.title: Climate Tech Startup With Celebrity And Billionaire Backers Files For Bankruptcy
items.description: The company, which grew out of fintech Aspiration, owes $30 million to billionaire Steve Ballmer’s L.A. Clippers. It reported a $580 million accumulat...

items.title: Picture This: Big Changes With ChatGPT’s Image Release
items.description: I listened to an AI Daily Brief about ChatGPT’s new image capabilities, based on an X post by Balaji Srinivasan.

items.title: Microsoft Teams Users Exploited In Sophisticated Multi-Stage AI Attack
items.description: Threat actors are getting more creative to trick users into multi-stage hack attacks. As this exploit targeting Microsoft Teams users demonstrates.

items.title: Apple Intelligence Comes To Vision Pro With VisionOS 2.4
items.description: The VisionOS 2.4 update adds a stack of Apple Intelligence features to the Vision Pro headset, including Genmoji, Writing Tools and Image Playground.
